definitions.body: ascent of hill or mt.: to a city 1Sa 9:11, to the royal sepulchers (in Jerus.) 2Ch 32:33; [[הַזֵּיתִית]] ´[[מִ]] 2Sa 15:30 (v. [[זַיִת]]

); [[עַקְרַבִּים]] ´[[מ]] = Srorpion-pass, on S. border of Pal., Ju Jdg 1:36, Nu 36:4, Jos 15:3 (both P), i.e. prob. the Naḳb eṣ-ṣafâ SW. from Dead Sea Buhl:Geogr. 16. 66 Di and GFM ad loc., and reff.; oft. def. By n.pr.loc.: [[אֲדֻמִים]] ´[[מ]] Jos 15:7, Jos 18:17, S. of valley of Achor, between Jerusalem and Jericho, cf. mod. Tel‘at ed-dâm Buhl:Geogr. 98.; v. also [[בֵּית חוֹרׂן]] I. [[גּוּר]], II. [[חֶרֶס]], [[לוּחִית]], II. [[חיץ]].
